column2: House of M: Masters of Evil (2009) #3
column6: What do you do if your criminal gang has outgrown their territory? If you're The Hood you set your sights on taking over a whole country!  But the mineral-rich South American nation of Santo Rico already has rulers-the X-foes known as Madison Jeffries and his insane, flesh-twisting brother Lionel--who don't intend to give it up without a fight! Oh, and we finally learn how Magneto feels about all this... Rated T  ...$3.99
